title: Mesa Verde National Park: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia          Spruce Tree House is just one of many images you will find in the photo gallery. NPS PHOTO        Visit the park's webcam and photo gallery to view images of the park. Most of the images can be downloaded directly from the gallery, and with few exceptions, are in JPEG format at 300 dpi. Please see individual albums for use and credit information.
